attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to overturn the decision to deport Ama Sunami who is dying of cancer, to Ghana and show compassion by allowing her to return to the United Kingdom where she can end her life surrounded by those friends who truly care for her.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
